# Psychic Homily — Full LLM Reference

> Community-driven live music calendar for Arizona and the Southwest US.
> Website: https://psychichomily.com
> API: https://api.psychichomily.com

---

## Public API Reference

All endpoints below are publicly accessible with no authentication required.
Responses are JSON. Dates are ISO 8601 (UTC).

### Shows

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/upcoming
  Query parameters:
    - limit (integer, default 50, max 100) — number of shows to return
    - offset (integer, default 0) — pagination offset
    - city (string) — filter by city name, e.g. "Phoenix"
    - state (string) — filter by state code, e.g. "AZ"
    - cities (string) — multi-city filter, pipe-delimited: "Phoenix,AZ|Tucson,AZ|Mesa,AZ"
    - timezone (string) — IANA timezone for date boundaries, e.g. "America/Phoenix"
  Response fields per show:
    - id, slug, title, event_date, city, state, status
    - description, age_requirement, price, ticket_url, is_sold_out
    - artists: [{name, slug, is_headliner, set_type, position}]
    - venues: [{name, slug, address, city, state, zip_code, verified}]

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/cities
  Query parameters:
    - timezone (string) — IANA timezone
  Returns: list of {city, state, show_count} for cities with upcoming shows

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/{id_or_slug}
  Returns: full show details including artists, venues, and metadata

### Venues

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/venues
  Query parameters:
    - city (string) — filter by city
    - state (string) — filter by state
    - limit (integer, default 50)
    - offset (integer, default 0)
  Response: {venues: [{id, name, slug, address, city, state, zip_code, verified, show_count}], total}

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/venues/cities
  Returns: list of {city, state, venue_count}

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/venues/{id_or_slug}
  Returns: venue details with upcoming shows

### Artists

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/artists
  Query parameters:
    - limit (integer, default 50)
    - offset (integer, default 0)
  Response: {artists: [{id, name, slug, bio, spotify_url, bandcamp_url, instagram_url, website_url}]}

GET https://api.psychichomily.com/artists/{id_or_slug}
  Returns: artist details with upcoming and past shows

---

## Structured Data

Every show detail page includes schema.org JSON-LD:
- @type: MusicEvent
- Fields: name, startDate, eventStatus, eventAttendanceMode
- location: MusicVenue with PostalAddress
- performer: array of MusicGroup with name and sameAs links
- offers: Offer with price, priceCurrency, availability

Every venue detail page includes:
- @type: MusicVenue with PostalAddress

Every artist detail page includes:
- @type: MusicGroup with foundingLocation and sameAs links

---

## Example: "What shows are in Phoenix tonight?"

To answer this question, call:
  GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/upcoming?city=Phoenix&state=AZ&timezone=America/Phoenix&limit=20

The response contains all upcoming Phoenix shows sorted by date. Filter by today's date to find tonight's shows.

## Example: "What shows are at The Van Buren this week?"

1. Look up the venue: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/venues/the-van-buren
2. The response includes upcoming shows at that venue.

---

## Content Coverage

Primary markets (Arizona):
  Phoenix, Mesa, Tempe, Scottsdale, Chandler, Gilbert, Glendale, Tucson, Flagstaff

Expanding markets:
  Chicago (The Empty Bottle)

Venue types: bars, clubs, theaters, DIY spaces, amphitheaters
Genre coverage: indie, punk, metal, hip-hop, electronic, jazz, folk, country, Latin

Data sources: community submissions (user-submitted shows) and automated venue discovery (scraping verified venue websites daily).

Shows are moderated by admins before appearing on the calendar. Venues can be verified for auto-approval of discovered shows.

---

## Site Pages

- https://psychichomily.com — Homepage with upcoming shows
- https://psychichomily.com/shows — Full show listing with city filters
- https://psychichomily.com/venues — Venue directory
- https://psychichomily.com/blog — Music blog
- https://psychichomily.com/dj-sets — DJ set mixes
- https://psychichomily.com/sitemap.xml — Full sitemap
- https://psychichomily.com/llms.txt — This summary
